artist: Designer: Louis Kyser; Designer: Alfred C. Rex; Manufacturer: Kyser & Rex Company
description: small white dog holds tray in mouth; dog on top of oval building with open design; arched door with four windows and "DOG TRAY 1880 BANK" on front side
markings:
on bottom, on sticker 1:[G76 4-4-8 / \"Dog Tray Bank\" / 77 1357.50 3790 / 51050.75 / M70 AD 71900]
on bottom, on sticker 2: [From The / WALTER P. CHRYSLER / And / WALTER P. CHRYSLER, Jr. / COLLECTION / No. ................................ / Sold by DAVID HOLLANDER / N.Y.C.]
signed: On front below top edge in relief: [DOG TRAY / 1880 / BANK]
title: "Dog Tray Bank" mechanical bank
